element.name: Krypton
element.availability: Krypton is present in the air at about 1 ppm.
element.sources: Forms 1 millionth of the atmosphere. Obtained from production of liquid air.
element.uses: Used in fluorescent bulbs, flashbulbs, UV lasers and as a wavelength standard.

notes.ptext: Recently at the University of Helsinki in Finland some scientists made HKrCN and HKrCCH (krypton hydride-cyanide and hydrokryptoacetylene); they are stable up to 40'K.
